title: LinguaMate-Tutor (AI + Chatbot)
description: End-to-end personal language tutor; deployed with Render(FastAPI), Netlify(Static HTML) including automatic rollback and observability.

title: MCP Job Search Pipeline (Data + MLOps)
description: Orchestrated pipeline for data ingestion, schema/statistical validation, and a set of ready‑to‑use job search prompt agents using an MCP server.

title: Personal Portfolio (Data)
description: A performant, responsive personal portfolio with mobile‑first Tailwind styling, PWA support, dark mode, AOS animations, and Chart.js skills visualization.
